Package odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne

Class LearningMachine

java.lang.Object
odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne.LearningMachine
public class LearningMachine extends Object
A Learning machine uses a WEKA SMO (SVM) to retrieve a predicted category for each Classify Document. The Learning Machine uses the arff Data to construct a training Instances and the Classify Documents to contruct a classify Instances.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LearningMachine(String trainPath, VocabCollection tempVocab)
    Creates a Learning Machine with an arff file and an associated VocabCollection.

  • Constructor Details

    • LearningMachine

      public LearningMachine(String trainPath, VocabCollection tempVocab)
      Creates a Learning Machine with an arff file and an associated VocabCollection. Also, reads the arff file into the training Instances object.
      Parameters:
      trainPath - A path to an arff file
      tempVocab - A VocabCollection associated with the arff file

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
      Coordinates the execution of the Learning Machine by constructing the Attribute Info, extracting the data from the Classify Documents, and predicting the category of each Classify Document.
      Parameters:
      documents - A list of Classify Documents to be classified.

    • readInARFF

      public void readInARFF(String arffPath)
      Reads the data from an arff file into the training Instances object.
      Parameters:
      arffPath - A path to an arff file

    • constructAttributeInfo

      Constructs the attribute info to be used in the creation of the classify Instances object.

      Parameters:
      documents - A list of Classify Documents

    • createSMO

      public void createSMO()
      Constructs the SMO (SVM) using the training Instances object.

    • classifyData

      public void classifyData(List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
      Classifies the classify Instances object using the SMO (SVM) and sets the category in each respective Classify Document.
      Parameters:
      documents - A list of Classify Documents
